TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SequenceReaderExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class SequenceReaderExtensions abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides extended functionality for the class that allows reading of endian specific numeric values from binary data.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryReadBigEndian (this ref System.Buffers.SequenceReader<byte> reader, out short value);
.method public static hidebysig bool TryReadBigEndian(valuetype System.Buffers.SequenceReader`1<unsigned int8>& reader, [out] int16& value) cil managed

static member TryReadBigEndian : SequenceReader * int16 -> bool

Docs.param: The byte sequence reader instance from which the value is to be read.
When the method returns, the value read out of the byte sequence reader, as big endian.
Docs.summary: Tries to read an as big endian.
Docs.returns: if the read operation is successful; if there isn't enough data for an .
